name: The Great Fleece (Seona Bellamy)
description:
Guide Darren as he breaks into the Beatrice Auction House to help himself to its famed riches. With the trusty Oliver on comms, sneak past guards and security cameras to reach the main vault. Untold wealth awaits!

This is a short, single-scene game created for a training course in cinematic cut-scenes and stealth mechanics. The course and all game assets were provided by GameDevHQ.
